tooltip.gtlendless.first_water_bucket.de: §7The first bucket of water in your MC journey (I've made it infinite, no need to thank me. Though it might not be very useful~)
tooltip.gtlendless.first_log.title: ✦ Primordial Wood ✦
tooltip.gtlendless.first_log.description: §7The first log in your MC journey (It doesn't seem very useful~
tooltip.gtlendless.final_proton.descript: §7Symbolizing the element of §4destruction§7, one of the fundamental particles that constitute matter
tooltip.gtlendless.genesis_factor.descri: §7Symbolizing the element of §acreation§7, one of the fundamental particles that constitute matter
gtlendless.pseudo_machine.hint: Available Recipe Types: Steam Furnace, Final Furnace
gtlendless.pseudo_machine.description: §7This is your first step on the path to the Final.
config.gtlendless.option.enableDirectInv: Enable direct inventory drop feature (only works on this mod's blocks)
config.gtlendless.option.checkInventoryS: Check inventory space before dropping (not recommended to disable)
config.gtlendless.option.additionalBlock: Blacklist (use # for tags or directly write block IDs)
config.gtlendless.option.useDefaultTool: Default tool gtceu:echoite_vajra enabled, please delete 'delete' and enter your tool ID below
gtlendless.jei.transformation_text: Automatically transforms into a real machine when placed. Right-click the real machine to view the multiblock structure display.
gtlendless.machine.parallel_hatch.toolti: Controls parallel processing of multiblock machines. Can be configured with circuits or precise parallel settings.
gtlendless.parallel_hatch.tooltip.mode.d: §7Two modes supported: §aCircuit Mode§7 (configure with digital circuits) and §ePrecise Mode§7 (direct parallel input)
gtlendless.parallel_hatch.tooltip.note: §cNote: Must be used in a multiblock structure
tooltip.gtlendless.multiblock_scanner.de: Scans structures in the game and exports them in TXT format for easy multiblock structure registration (It's really powerful!)
tooltip.gtlendless.multiblock_scanner.us: §71. Right-click to mark two diagonal points
message.gtlendless.multiblock_scanner.bo: Both points marked! Press Shift+Right-click to export structure TXT
message.gtlendless.multiblock_scanner.no: §cThe scan area must contain a Scanner Controller block!
message.gtlendless.multiblock_scanner.to: §cThe scan area can only have one Scanner Controller block!
message.gtlendless.multiblock_scanner.co: Error: Scanner Controller cannot face up/down, please correct it!
message.gtlendless.multiblock_scanner.no: Error: Scanner Controller has no recorded player facing
message.gtlendless.multiblock_scanner.to: Error: Structure contains too many block types
message.gtlendless.multiblock_scanner.si: Please simplify the structure or reduce block types (maximum 295 block types supported)
gtlendless.machine.scanner_controller.to: Core component of the Multiblock Structure Scanner
gtlendless.machine.scanner_controller.fe: When in developer mode, can serve as a multiblock structure controller display. When scanned by the structure scanner, displayed as 'K' in exported files; please replace with your own main controller
Supports multi-level automatic multiblock structure placement
Configurable parallel control for placement speed, higher parallel requires more server resources (use with caution!)
gui.gtlendless.scanner_config.title: Multiblock Structure Scanner Configuration
gui.gtlendless.scanner_config.global_mod:
On: Global Mode (all air replaced with #)
Off: Edge Mode (only edge air replaced with #)
gui.gtlendless.scanner_config.compact_ou:
On: Compact Output (only GTCEu format)
Off: Full Output (includes all scan data)
gui.gtlendless.scanner_config.render_mod:
On: Enable all visual rendering
Off: Disable all visual rendering
